name: Adventurexa
description:
An voxel adventure game for a gamejam.  The game isn't full. In the future you may have a boss and more levels and story. 

All the levels are possible.

The reason of the lag may be caused because I made the game in Unreal Engine. You should watch a tutorial about how to window any game and scale down the window. 

Expect Bugs! 

The game was made in a hurry because I had to model all the maps and models.

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVE

SPACE - FLY

SPACE WHILE IN AIR - GLIDE

LMouse - TURN FLASHLIGHT ON/OFF

SHIFT - SPRINT

F - DASH

E - INTERACT

P - PAUSE

M - MENU

O - OVERWORLD
